name: XMAS RACER
description:
Christmas Sleigh Racing!!!

Description:

On Christmas Eve when the presents were ready, naughty children rushed into the Santa's warehouse. They stole some of the gifts and scattered them all around on one of the snowy mountains.

Now Santa Claus on his sleigh needs to find all presents to save Christmas.

Controls:

Acceleration - W or UP-arrow   

Slowing - S or DOWN-arrow

Left - A or LEFT-arrow

Right - D or RIGHT-arrow

Pause - Esc

Credits:
